statements.statement: SELECT l.LabelNo,l.LabelNo,l.ParentNo,l.LabelName,ISNULL(pop.SortId,0) AS SortId,ISNULL(pop.Status,0) AS Status FROM SWfsProductLabel AS l LEFT JOIN SWfsPopElements AS pop ON l.LabelNo = pop.LabelNo WHERE ParentNo=@ParentNo ORDER BY pop.SortId DESC
SELECT COUNT(0) AS DataCount FROM SWfsProductRefLabel AS l LEFT JOIN WfsProduct AS p ON l.ProductNo = p.ProductNo WHERE l.RefLabelNo like @RefLabelNo+'%'

INSERT INTO SWfsPopElements ([CategoryNo], [LabelNo], [Status], [SortId], [OperatorUserId], [DateCreate]) VALUES (@CategoryNo, @LabelNo, @Status, @SortId, @OperatorUserId, @DateCreate); select cast(@@IDENTITY as varchar(50))
SELECT ElementsId,CategoryNo,LabelNo,Status,SortId FROM SWfsPopElements WHERE CategoryNo =@CategoryNo AND LabelNo=@LabelNo
SELECT Count(0) AS Count FROM SWfsPopElements
select lr.ProductNo,l.LabelNo,l.ParentNo,l.LabelName,l.LabelNickName from SWfsProductRefLabel as lr left join SWfsProductLabel as l on lr.RefLabelNo=l.LabelNo
